title: Did Frito-Lay Issue a Product Recall Due to Salmonella Fears?
subtitle: An April 2017 recall of Frito-Lay jalapeno-flavored products was reported as new in July and August 2017.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Frito-Lay issued a recall of two potato chip products in April 2017 over Salmonella-related fears, a report framed as new in July and August 2017.
